text:
use any of the incompatible features on the link you just sent e.g

```{% set doesntMatter = local_dt %}```
since local date needs to update to the current time someone loads the page this “breaks” prerendering

Can I ask why you want to disable it?
if it’s just for testing you can add
?hsCacheBuster=1234
or
?hsDebug=true
to the url and this will disable it whilst it’s on the url (e.g. for testing)
